text: John Robert Maurice Jacobs OBE (14 March 1925 â€“ 13 January 2017) was an English professional golfer, coach, entrepreneur, writer and administrator. He was inducted into the World Golf Hall of Fame in 2000. He was born in Yorkshire. He founded the PGA European Tour in 1972. Jacobs' death was announced on 13 January 2017 at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile on the World Golf Hall of Fame's official site Category:1925 births Category:2017 deaths Category:British golfers Category:English businesspeople Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire Category:Writers from Yorkshire
title: John Jacobs (English golfer)
